Claribet is grateful for the support she's received from Fondo Esperanza, the loans they've extended, of course, but also the free training they provide at group meetings.  The meetings are fun and she likes sharing ideas with the other members of the group with whom she gets along well.  
Puente Alto is just north of Santiago, Chile's capital.  It was a small rural town at the end of the 19th century, but it has grown to be one of the largest towns in Chile, with a population of more than 600,000 people.  It's in the foothills that lie within the metropolitan area, an area known as Cajon del Maipo and famous for hiking, rafting and other outdoor activities.  It's know, too, for its restaurants and hotels.

loans.use: to buy fruit for her produce business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To cultivate a horticultural farm and to buy seeds

loans.name: Djikane Madiake Group

texts.fr:
Le groupe de solidarité est créé le 04 juin 2010. Le groupe est  composé de quinze femmes qui habitent le même quartier. Leur activité principale est le petit commerce.

Madame Fatou qui est à la droite de la photo levant la main est responsable de groupe. Elle est âgée de 56 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de cinq enfants.

Elle s’active dans la vente de repas(petit déjeuner, déjeuner et diner). Elle a une bonne expérience dans ce domaine d’activité, qu'elle pratique depuis très longtemps.

Ce prêt lui permettra de renforcer son capital et de mieux développer  ses activités.

Les profits lui permettront d’améliorer les conditions de vie de la famille (scolarité etc.…)
texts.en:
This solidarity group was created on June 4, 2010. The group is composed of fifteen women who live in the same district. Their main work involves small-scale commerce. 

Ms. Fatou, who is at the right in the photo with her hand raised, is the group's official. She is 56 years old, married, and the mother of five children. She is active in selling meals (breakfast, lunch, and dinner). She has good experience in this business for having worked at it for a long time. 

This loan will enable her to boost her capital and to develop her business further. The profits will allow her to improve her family’s situation (schooling, etc....)

loans.use: to buy grocery items

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge Luis, tiene 25 años de edad, es casado, vive con su esposa y su hija de 2 años en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C JESUS NOS AMA, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Los Amarillos, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol Gandul.

Jorge  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y fréjol Gandul. Compra sus productos en el Comercial Camacho y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.
 
Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz, compra de abonos e insumos  para los cultivos.   El  crédito le servirá de apoyo para suplir sus necesidades económicas y mejorar sus actividades agrícolas. Enfrenta desafíos como enfermedades en los cultivos como cinta roja en el maíz. Su sueño es comprarse una finca. 

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Jorge Luis, 25, is married and lives with his wife and 2-year-old daughter in the Ventanas Canton in the province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank JESUS NOS AMA is located in the community of Los Amarillos which belongs to the Ventanas Canton.  This group is involved in growing short-cycle crops such as corn, rice and Gandul beans.

Jorge also grows corn, rice and Gandul beans.  He buys his supplies in Comercial Camacho and sells his produce at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies and fertilizer for his corn crop.  The loan will help cover his economic needs and improve his farm activities.  He is up against challenges such as crop plagues (red ribbon in corn). His dream is to buy a farm one day.

He enjoys sports.

loans.use: To buy supplies and fertilizer for his corn crop.

loans.name: Bosco

texts.en: Bosco, 26, is a married man blessed with one child living in a semi-permanent house in Kamwenge, Uganda. His main dream is to buy more milling machines and place them in different areas of his region. He mills cassava flour and has been in this business for three years. A major challenge he faces is the constant breakdown of the machines, which makes him inefficient. Bosco needs the loan to help him to buy a milling machine.

loans.use: to buy a milling machine.

loans.name: Mohamed

texts.en:
Mohamed is a married man with one child who is still too young for school. He lives in a rental house that has electricity and piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food and rent bills.

For the past three years, he has operated a hardware business, selling in a shop to his neighbours. He faces a major challenge of theft because of insecurity in his area of operation. He dreams of becoming a leading supplier of timber in the future.

With the Kshs 20,000 he wants to purchase timber for resale. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: To purchase timber for resale.

loans.name: Christine

texts.fr: Christine est une femme âgée de 48 ans, elle est mariée à un monsieur qui est ferrailleur. Elle a 6 enfants. Christine travaille comme revendeuse de produits alimentaires. Le nom de sa boutique est « VIS-A-VIS ». Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de Lomé. Elle sollicite son premier crédit pour acheter et revendre des cahiers en ce début d’année scolaire pour réaliser des profits.
texts.en: Christine is a 48-year- old woman. She is married to a man who is a scrap metal dealer. She has 6 children. Christine works as a reseller of general store food products. The name of her shop is "VIS-A-VIS". She gets her supplies at the big market in Lomé. She seeks her first loan to buy and resell notebooks at the beginning of the school year for a profit.

loans.use: to buy general store products
